title: 方
q: What does 方 define in comparisons?
a: 方 defines the direction the comparison is leaning toward

title: 方
q: How 方 is read when used for comparison?

title: より
q: What does より define in comparisons?
a: より defines the side the comparison is leaning away from

title: ほど
q: What does ほど describe in comparisons?
a: ほど describes the extent of something

title: 方/より
q: What part of speech are 方, より, ほど
a:
方 - noun
より - particle
ほど - particle
